name: late night run
description:
late night run

a spiritual successor to our other game, 'a night out' (https://lamedeveloper.itch.io/a-night-out).

go last minute christmas shopping.

made for https://itch.io/jam/jame-gam-christmas-edition

by lamedev, with help from https://twitter.com/jeepersedd and https://twitter.com/Mungeons
